channel.title: B1 Informatics 1 WS 2023/24 on Prof. Dr. Barne Kleinen
channel.description: Recent content in B1 Informatics 1 WS 2023/24 on Prof. Dr. Barne Kleinen

item.title: Code Examples
item.description:
Don’t worry about noting down any code changes I make in class - I will upload everything to github!

If I make changes during class, I will push them to the branch with the semester name. To switch to the branch, select the according semester in the branches menu in the upper left corner on each repository’s main page.(it shows “main” usually - the default branch) Note that it might also be quite convenient to look at the code on the github page online, the commit history shows you the exact changes I made during class. Click on “commits” and then one individual commit, and you you’ll see the changes.
